text: How to create custom cards in the HubSpot API? Any ideas

Hello, we are building dynamic pages with a custom object in the CMS. We are trying to use graphql to bring some data from that custom object and associations. BUT we are not being able to pass the RECORD ID of our dynamic page CO to the graphql.
We are checking the documentation and we see the example of contacts, but not working for our CO.
Is there any example with custom object somewhere?

<https://boilerplate.HubSpotcms.com/recruiting-agency/role-listing>

<https://github.com/HubSpot/recruiting-agency-graphql-theme>

is a sample of using GraphQL data query dynamic pages for a custom object, it does use the exact same method as <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/use-graphql-data-in-your-website-pages#create-dynamic-pages-using-query-data>, however. What issue are you running into exactly?

Thank you <@U6W3H6YN8>
<@U04A61S6UH1> we were able to do it!!! Its awesome!
Can you share the site you are building? Curious to see it!
We can share the code and maybe a presentation of what we are doing but the actual pages built with custom objects are visible only if you are associated with that custom object :grinning:
Hi guys how can I eliminate the test emailid form my contact list and even from my email stats.
